name: Murakoshi Seikai no Bakuchou Nihon Rettou
overview: Murakoshi Seikai Bakuchou Nippon Rettou 1 (aka Murakoshi Seikai no Bakuchou Nihon Rettou) is the first fishing game sponsored by japanese angler man Murakoshi Seikai. In the story mode the player can go with Murakoshi Seikai and fish in the Japan seas. The game features a shop where the player can buy new rod, lures and even see the fishes that he catched. There are different fishes to catch. There are also a record part to check the different fish records.
